name: Depression_ClinicalGroupingCondition
title: Depression_Clinical Grouping Condition
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for the Depression_Clinical Grouping Condition
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Depression_Clinical Grouping Condition and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Data Element Scope: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Depression_Clinical Grouping Condition and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Depression_Clinical Grouping Condition and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Exclusion Criteria: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Depression_Clinical Grouping Condition and utilization in patients/users connected health.)
